text: Hi Prasad, have you tried using `<Flex>` to manage spacing here? We also have bullet list available now, in case that's something you were looking to do.
Hello Matthew, they are not yet supported for mobile app.
Ah, thank you for the update!

Are there any plans for the future of this becoming something? I understand the SaaS and web side is completely different than the mobile app and I think that would be something complicated to route RESTful type of user developed controls into.
Hi Matthew, we are aware of the need for mobile app support, but we haven't decided any timeline on that, yet.
Thank you again!

<@U01QVR44MEY> Sure, but I'm working on a custom validation that goes like this: you can't click the 'Next' button before updating property X. I don't have immediate feedback from the APIs to know if the client has filled the property or not.
Ah totally get that, if you go done that type of route you'll have to build the inputs and logic totally custom
yes :disappointed: this component it's very cool and powerful , if we can have the onChange i'm super happuy ahahha
:heart:
you could hack it with images if you _really_ wanted too
i would not suggest it tho
lol, yeah not doing that bro

has anyone ever ran into this error when using the CLI to create a package?

```[WARNING] The deployed build for this project does not contain '[UI Extension] This may cause issues in local development. To reflect these changes and continue testing:```
seems like it's not pushing the rest of the files up even if I do hs project upload?
Static map images are no bueno for me
lol
This is popping up with just the blank project from the CLI
figured it out....apparently this one account isn't in the beta and even if I join it just....doesn't work

Sorry Broâ€¦ 

Does this mean Maps or adding Google Maps is currently not possible? <@U01QVR44MEY>
Yeah you can't have a map that is embedded on the card, you can have a popup that opens a map though
But a lot of things I want to build rely on maps that are actually part of the experience, opening a popup really breaks the experience

We've recently been experiencing a strange issue causing our custom CRM cards to lose association with the custom tab we added to the middle column of our Company records.  After the deployment of the custom CRM card in question, the card would no longer render on the custom tab and was not checked in the "Default view" forcing me to have to reconfigure the "Default view" of that tab to add the custom CRM card back.  I don't remember this happening before.
Is anyone else experiencing this issue?
Is this normal?
Any help would be appreciated.
Thanks
Wow. Noted.
This happened to me yesterday. I made a note to investigate.
